data.text: @hannahlollman Omgosh how could I forget the best looking Bond: Sir Roger Moore in a feather cape chair in Live and Let Die or Sir Roger Moore as a clown in . . . Octopussy? Not 100% clear on that memory.

@hannahlollman Best Movie: Moonraker
Funniest: Man With the Golden Gun
Best Bad Guy: Jaws
Best Bond: Sir Roger Moore
Best-looking Bond: Sir Roger Moore in A View to a Kill when he's wearing a brown suit in a brown car with soft orange sunset light and he looks so done. 😘
@ashlynlollman I had it on as background noise today! It’s my favorite.
@hannahlollman Skyfall is my second favorite. Casino Royale is still my top. I need to watch a Bond movie soon. Going on my relaxing to do list.
@hannahlollman It wasn’t until reading your tweet that I remembered how great Skyfall is and now I need to watch it.
